name: Windrifter
description:
You play by launching and controlling paperplanes. 

Your planes are your way of locomotion as you teleport where they crash.

It's a prototype with only 3 night of developpement. But i like the feeling, so i will try to improve that and make a game with that.

If you like it, say it ! It will encourage me to work on the game and make me happy !

It's a networked game with room of 20 people with a very dumb matchmaking.

Xbox controller = best experience ! Controls

------------------------------------------------------

Keyboard :

  • Space to launch a plane
  • use Arrows to control your plane

Xbox Controller :

  • X to launch a plane
  • Left stick to control your plane
Features

------------------------------------------------------

  • Fun simulation of paperplane
  • Fun locomotion system
  • Play with your friends and beat theirs scores
  • Enter ingame contest for more challenge
  • No risk as the game is free while in prototype phase
  • Less than 50 Mb
Enjoy & Have fun

------------------------------------------------------

Your comments and feedback are welcome !
